p: Similar to the rate of germling growth, the percent cover of juvenile CCA significantly increased in the medium pCO 2 treatment level (ANOVA, p = 0.007, Fig 6A) ( S5 Table). We found a decline in percent cover of germlings of 29% from control to high pCO 2 and 39% from medium to high pCO 2 ( Fig 6A, S5 Table). When plotting the data by irradiance levels, this trend was consistent in the high and low irradiance intensity ( Fig 6D and 6E). Neither temperature nor irradiance had an effect on total percent cover ( Fig 6B and 6C).
